pr_title: Fix postgresql deadlock in integration tests

timeline.message:
do not run cleanup.sql BEFORE_TEST_METHOD to avoid postgresql deadlock with async post date range processing

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

fix test case failure

Signed-off-by: Xin Li <xin.li@swirlds.com>

timeline.bodyText: This test fails in my local env but not in CircleCI runs. What happened is if the Sql annotations here do not match exactly those in IntegrationTest, springboot test will list all 3 sql scripts and cleanup.sql will run in AFTER_TEST_METHOD phase and errors out since it tries to truncate tables after V1.28.1
timeline.author: xin-hedera

replies.bodyText:
There is an open ticket regarding this confusing behavior:
https://bugs.openjdk.java.net/browse/JDK-8188040
for annotations which are both repeatable and inherited
replies.author: xin-hedera
